content:
Q: Can I buy travel insurance after departure?
A: No, travel insurance should be purchased before your trip commences.
questions: Is it possible to purchase travel insurance once I have already started my journey?
What is the policy on buying travel insurance after leaving for a trip?
Can travel insurance be obtained after departure?
When should travel insurance be purchased?
Is it mandatory to buy travel insurance before the trip starts?
What happens if I try to buy travel insurance after my trip has started?
Are there any exceptions that allow purchasing travel insurance post-departure?
Why can't I buy travel insurance after I've already departed?
What are the rules regarding the timing of purchasing travel insurance?
Can I get travel insurance if I forgot to purchase it before my trip?
